title: Check Status of a Pothole Repair
description: A citizen who previously reported a pothole calls to check on the status of the repair.

tasks.description: Look up the original service request using the citizen's name or the request ID.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the original pothole report.

tasks.description: Check the status of the associated work order in the public works system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the work order is marked as 'Completed' yesterday.

tasks.description: Inform the citizen that records show the repair was completed and close the service request.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the final status update to the citizen.
